data.comment: The match has started at Wanda Metropolitano.
Corner awarded to Cadiz.
In the minute 2, Throw-in Cadiz.
Marcos Llorente gets his shot on target but fails to score for Atletico.
Adrian Cordero Vega awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 5, Atletico drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In Madrid a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 8, Joao Felix heads in to make it 1-0 at Wanda Metropolitano.
Marcos Llorente instrumental with a fine assist.
Throw-in for Cadiz in the half of Atletico.
In the minute 9, Throw-in high up the field for Cadiz in Madrid.
Adrian Cordero Vega signals a free kick to Cadiz just outside Atletico's area.
Throw-in for Atletico in their own half.
In the minute 12, Adrian Cordero Vega signals a free kick to Cadiz.
Adrian Cordero Vega signals a free kick to Atletico in their own half.
Cadiz awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 14, Free kick Cadiz.
Free kick for Atletico in the half of Cadiz.
In Madrid a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 21, Throw-in for Cadiz at Wanda Metropolitano.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Madrid.
It's now 2-0 in Madrid as Marcos Llorente scores for Atletico.
In the minute 23, Cadiz are caught offside.
Free kick for Atletico in their own half.
Cadiz have been awarded a corner by Adrian Cordero Vega.
In the minute 27, Cadiz have been awarded a corner by Adrian Cordero Vega.
Ball goes out of play for a Atletico goal kick.
Ball safe as Cadiz is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 30, Adrian Cordero Vega awards Atletico a goal kick.
Free kick for Cadiz in the half of Atletico.
In Madrid, Atletico push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 33, Adrian Cordero Vega signals a Atletico throw-in in Cadiz's half.
In Madrid Atletico drive forward through Luis Suarez. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Free kick Cadiz.
In the minute 35, Goal kick for Atletico at Wanda Metropolitano.
Luis Suarez (Atletico) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
Cadiz have a goal kick.
In the minute 37, Throw-in Cadiz.
Adrian Cordero Vega awards the home team a throw-in.
Cadiz awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 41, Ball goes out of play for a Atletico goal kick.
Atletico awarded a free kick in their own half.
Cadiz have a goal kick.
In the minute 45, The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
The second-half is underway at Wanda Metropolitano.
Corner awarded to Cadiz.
Jairo Izquierdo is replacing Alfonso Espino for the away team.
In the minute 46, Pedro Alcala is replacing Carlos Akapo for Cadiz at Wanda Metropolitano.
Adrian Cordero Vega awards Atletico a goal kick.
In the minute 48, Corner awarded to Cadiz.
Free kick for Atletico in their own half.
Can Atletico get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Cadiz's half?
Goal! Atletico extend their lead to 3-0 through Luis Suarez.
In the minute 51, That's a fine assist from Joao Felix.
Cadiz have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 55, Atletico awarded a free kick in their own half.
Atletico make their first substitution with Angel Correa replacing Marcos Llorente.
Adrian Cordero Vega signals a free kick to Cadiz.
In the minute 57, Jens Jonsson (Cadiz) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In Madrid Atletico attack through Angel Correa. The finish is off target, however.
Goal kick for Cadiz at Wanda Metropolitano.
In the minute 59, Cadiz have been awarded a corner by Adrian Cordero Vega.
Cadiz's Jairo Izquierdo is on target but unsuccessful.
Cadiz to take a throw-in in Atletico territory.
In the minute 61, The away team replace Anthony Lozano with Alberto Perea.
Jorge Pombo is on a sub for Augusto Fernandez for Cadiz.
The home team replace Hector Herrera with Lucas Torreira.
In the minute 63, Atletico push forward at Wanda Metropolitano and Joao Felix gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Cadiz defence.
Throw-in for Cadiz in their own half.
Fali for Cadiz drives towards goal at Wanda Metropolitano. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 65, Cadiz have been awarded a corner by Adrian Cordero Vega.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Madrid.
Adrian Cordero Vega signals a free kick to Cadiz in their own half.
In the minute 67, In Madrid a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Cadiz awarded a free kick in their own half.
Atletico's Luis Suarez breaks free at Wanda Metropolitano. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 71, Adrian Cordero Vega awards Cadiz a goal kick.
Atletico make their third substitution with Geoffrey Kondogbia replacing Koke.
Diego Simeone (Atletico) is making a fourth substitution, with Thomas Lemar replacing Luis Suarez.
In the minute 72, Alvaro Cervera is making the team's fifth substitution at Wanda Metropolitano with Garrido replacing Jens Jonsson.
Throw-in for Cadiz in the half of Atletico.
Atletico have a goal kick.
In the minute 76, Atletico advance rapidly upfield but Adrian Cordero Vega blows for offside.
Free kick for Cadiz in the half of Atletico.
Ball goes out of play for a Atletico goal kick.
In the minute 79, Atletico to take a throw-in in Cadiz territory.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Corner awarded to Atletico.
In the minute 80, Goal kick for Cadiz at Wanda Metropolitano.
Corner awarded to Atletico.
Lucas Torreira (Atletico) goes close with a header but the ball is scrambled away by Cadiz defenders.
In the minute 82, Cadiz's Garrido gets in a shot on goal at Wanda Metropolitano. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Can Cadiz get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Atletico's half?
Adrian Cordero Vega signals a Cadiz throw-in in Atletico's half.
In the minute 82, Adrian Cordero Vega signals a free kick to Cadiz in their own half.
Adrian Cordero Vega signals a free kick to Cadiz.
Geoffrey Kondogbia (Atletico) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 87, Important block from the Atletico defence as Garrido fires in a strike for Cadiz.
Cadiz attack but Alvaro Negredo's header doesn't find the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Madrid.
In the minute 89, Ball safe as Atletico is awarded a throw-in in their half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 3 minutes of added time.
Free kick for Atletico in their own half.
The match is over. Final score 4-0.
Great finish from Joao Felix to give Atletico a 4-0 lead.
Great play from Angel Correa to set up the goal.
